The post [Security contact for security notification emails is generally available](https://github.blog/changelog/2025-09-14-security-contact-for-security-notification-emails-is-generally-available) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
EnhancedContent:
Enterprise admins can now designate a specific contact email for security incident notifications by navigating to **Settings** > **Profile** in their enterprise account. This optional field allows for targeted security communications. If you leave it blank, notifications will default to enterprise or organization admins as applicable.

This enhancement gives enterprises better control over who receives critical security alerts, enabling more efficient incident response workflows.
Author: Allison
Title: Security contact for security notification emails is generally available
